description.en: SHIELD is for people that value their time and identity. SHIELD also is future proof as it has multi-algo mining and has POS on it's way to lower the cost of maintaining the coin. SHIELD also has a low fee rate and will be quantum proof within a year. You can easily use SHIELD with its upcoming Electrum wallets. SHIELD will also change the face of P2P payments as we're going to integrate in almost any social media.
